about.title: About the Bot
paragraphs: The FURIA CS:GO Bot was created by fans, for fans. Our goal is to provide the FURIA community with the most reliable and up-to-date information about their favorite CS:GO team.
We use official data sources including PandaScore, Liquipedia, and BO3, along with FURIA's official channels to ensure all information is accurate and timely.
Whether you're following the men's lineup or the inclusive team, our bot keeps you connected to all FURIA CS:GO action.
